SELECT EMPNO , (REPLACE(TRIM(ENAME),' ', '')) AS ENAME , EPW , TO_CHAR(JOIN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOIN_DATE , DENAME , E_JOB , EMP.DEPTNO , LOC , DECODE(E_STATUS, 1, '재직중', 2,'휴직', 3,'퇴직') AS E_STATUS_STR , DECODE(E_ACCOUNT, 1, '정상', 2,'휴면') AS E_ACCOUNT_STR , DECODE(E_ROLE, 'USER', '직원', 'ADMIN','관리자','SUPER_ADMIN','책임 관리자') AS E_ROLE FROM EMP EMP, DEPT DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO
AND UPPER(${searchKeyword}) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%'
ORDER BY EMPNO DESC OFFSET #{offsetCnt} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{displayCnt} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(EMPNO) FROM EMP EMP, DEPT DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO
AND UPPER(${searchKeyword}) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%'

SELECT EMP.EMPNO , EMP.DEPTNO , LOC , DENAME , EPW , ENAME , E_JOB , TO_CHAR(JOIN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOIN_DATE , E_EMAIL , PHONE_TEL , OFFICE_TEL ,(SELECT ORIGIN_FILE_NAME FROM E_IMG WHERE EMPNO=EMP.EMPNO) AS ORIGIN_FILE_NAME ,(SELECT ATTACHED_FILE_NAME FROM E_IMG WHERE EMPNO=EMP.EMPNO) AS ATTACHED_FILE_NAME FROM EMP EMP, DEPT DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO AND EMPNO = #{empno}
